item.soulcoll.player_soul.tooltip.asomik: You know, I'm actually proud of this mod.
item.soulcoll.player_soul.tooltip1.asomi: It has an unbreakable bond with one other soul, making something
item.soulcoll.player_soul.tooltip2.asomi: overwordly that is capable of overcoming any obstable or challenge.
item.soulcoll.player_soul.tooltip.librar: The darkest of souls that went through all kinds of emotions,
item.soulcoll.player_soul.tooltip1.libra: let it be happiness, sadness, anger or anything else related.
item.soulcoll.player_soul.tooltip2.libra: It is yet to find its destination.
item.soulcoll.player_soul.tooltip2.spusi: Amogus §o(yes he literally agreed for it to be amogus)
item.soulcoll.player_soul.tooltip.aviole: The soul of the one I beLove.
item.soulcoll.player_soul.tooltip1.aviol: It has an unbreakable bond with one other soul, making something
item.soulcoll.player_soul.tooltip2.aviol: overwordly that is capable of overcoming any obstable or challenge.
item.soulcoll.player_soul.tooltip2.susik: Probably will write something else here later.
item.soulcoll.unstable_shard.tooltip: It's unstable..Because it's purple and black.
item.soulcoll.unstable_shard.tooltip1: Might be a part of something bigger.
item.soulcoll.raw_bebrock.tooltip1: Might be a part of something bigger.
item.soulcoll.bebrock_ingot.tooltip: The strong scent of this ingot
item.soulcoll.bebrock_ingot.tooltip1: makes you want to smell it.
item.soulcoll.ancient_soul.tooltip: A lost soul from the past.
item.soulcoll.soul_collector.tooltip: Fear a man who has nothing to lose,
item.soulcoll.soul_collector.tooltip1: but don't challenge a man with A THOUSAND SOULS!
item.soulcoll.soul_collector.tooltip2: Gives certain buffs when killing a mob.
item.soulcoll.dragon_rage.tooltip: A manifestation of the dragon's pure rage
item.soulcoll.dragon_rage.tooltip1: is gathered in the blade of this sword.
item.soulcoll.dragon_rage.tooltip2: Only one can be obtained per player.
item.soulcoll.metamorphosis.tooltip: An instrument made out of lots of empty shells.
item.soulcoll.metamorphosis.tooltip1: While holding it, you can hear a voice saying:
item.soulcoll.techno_blade.tooltip: Forged out of the 5 Techno emeralds, its power grows restlessly.
item.soulcoll.techno_blade.tooltip1: This weapon gets +1 damage every 501 kills on the counter.
item.soulcoll.techno_blade.tooltip2: This ability does not have a limit.
item.soulcoll.techno_blade.tooltip3: And his words echoed through the hall: so long nerds
item.soulcoll.resprite_hammer.tooltip1: The origin of this hammer is unknown, although it is
item.soulcoll.resprite_hammer.tooltip2: suggested that it's the long lost brother of Soul Basher.
item.soulcoll.pig_crown.tooltip: It might have belonged to someone..bloody.
item.soulcoll.pig_crown.tooltip1: You aren't worthy of wearing it.
item.soulcoll.succory.tooltip: A refreshing drink. Might help with your coffee addiction.
advancements.soulcoll.root.name: Soul Collector
advancements.soulcoll.root.desc: Much Love for installing Soul Collector!
advancements.soulcoll.steel_acquired.des: Find or smelt your first steel ingot
advancements.soulcoll.steel_set.name: Steel Man
advancements.soulcoll.steel_set.desc: Craft a full set of steel armor..and get disappointed
advancements.soulcoll.forge_soul_ingot.d: Merge a steel ingot and an ancient soul together
advancements.soulcoll.soul_basher.name: Stop! Bashing Time
advancements.soulcoll.soul_basher.desc: Craft a powerful weapon that can be used to bash out souls from your enemies
advancements.soulcoll.all_souls.name: You are Mine, Soul and..Soul!
advancements.soulcoll.all_souls.desc: Add all the mob souls into your collection, as well as yours
